item.description:

else if (NPCID == 550) { // RMPK Shop ! PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 11; //Archary store } else if (NPCID == 559) { //RMPK Shop 2 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 16; // arch store } else if (NPCID == 652) { // RMPK Shop 3 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 21; //magestore } else if (NPCID == 2262) { // dark mage rbe shp PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 32; }

Shops.cfgshop = 16 Brian's_Archery_Supplies. 2 2 886 1500 888 1000 890 800 843 4 845 4 849 3 847 3 853 2 851 2 shop = 11 RMPK Range Store 2 2 882 2000 884 1500 886 1000 888 800 890 600 877 1500 892 350 839 4 843 3 845 3 849 2 847 2 853 1 851 1 841 4 shop = 32 The_dark_mage_robe_shop 2 2 3385 10 3387 10 3389 10 3391 10 3393 10 4089 10 4091 10 4093 10 4095 10 4097 10 4099 10 4101 10 4103 10 4105 10 4107 10 4109 10 4111 10 4113 10 4115 1 4117 10 6916 10 6918 10 6920 10 6922 10 6924 10 shop = 21 Betty's Magic Emporium. 2 2 554 5000 555 5000 556 5000 557 5000 558 5000 559 5000 562 500 560 200 221 300 579 1 1017 1

And my problem is when i get to the NPCs it wont open the shop screen?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2007, 12:23:27 PM[/size][hr]HElzp!!!
